ODPs Reuse: Methodological Guidelines (IV)

DSP_PC7: What devices exist? 
Display, touchscreen, balise, keyboard, trackball, pulse oximeter,  
glucose meter, environmental temperature sensor, environmental 
humidity/pressure sensor, Anemometer, CO2 level sensor, printer, 
camera, GPS Receiver, short distance communication module  
(NFC. ZigBee, Bluetooth), long distance communication module 
(GPRS, UMTS, WiFi), processing module, memory module, 
loudspeaker, microphone and reading/writing module NFC
